name: THE Table Game
description:
Includes rule explanations so even beginners can dive right in!
Rules and how-tos are included for each game. It's perfect for anyone, whether you’re a brand new player or a veteran that needs a brush up.

　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　----Included games----
Two-player Mahjong・Four-player Mahjong・Othello・Go・Shogi・Tsume Shogi・Hanafuda Koikoi・Texas Hold 'em・Blackjack・Five Card Draw Poker・Chase・ Backgammon
intro: Play classics like Othello, Mahjong, Shogi, Go, and Texas Hold 'em,Chase, Backgammon,all in one game!
